Texts.Chs: 但不再是史蒂文了。甚至远不是。我们的语言完全不同，他的全身都涂上了这种……黏黏的东西。我恳求他们杀了它，烧掉它……但医生们只是盯着看！然后一个给史蒂文打了镇静剂……然后是我。当我醒来时，我都不知道我是怎么回到地球的。
Texts.Eng: But it wasn't Steven anymore. Not even remotely. The language was all different, and his whole body was coated with this...gross goop. I begged them to kill it, to burn it...but the doctors just stared! And then one tranquilized Steven and...and then me. I don't know how I got back to Earth but that's where I was when I woke up.

Texts.Chs: 首先，我心爱的史蒂文陷入昏迷。三个月来，我除了担心什么都没有！医生们不知道到底出了什么问题，我只能坐在那里等待。然后，他醒来胡言乱语……或者一次又一次的说“嗝嘎咯嘎”！然后他痛苦地死去了……但接下来的情况更糟！
Texts.Eng: First my beloved Steven lapses into a coma. For three months, nothing but worry! The doctors didn't know what the hell was wrong, and I just had to sit there waiting. Then, he wakes up babbling nonsense...or rather 'Greg gregga greg' over and over again! Then he passes painfully...but what came next was worse!

Texts.Chs: 我们以为生命体处于休眠状态。实验室技术人员把他放在一个桶旁边，然后桶里的东西撕碎了玻璃就好像玻璃不存在！它正好卡在他的身上！一个肮脏的东西穿透了他的脑袋，泄露了出来……然后他……他他站了起来！
Texts.Eng: We thought the lifeform was dormant. The lab techs had it in a vat near Greg...er....Steven...and the second Steven passed on it just...ripped through the glass like it was nothing! It latched right onto his body! Some foul thing lashed out, penetrated his head...and then he...he.....HE STOOD UP!

Texts.Chs: 他们对我的史蒂文做了什么？他去哪儿了？那个黏黏的是什么？
Texts.Eng: What did they do with my Steven? Where did he go? What was that thing?
